column4: greetings... ich just changed from fedora to ubuntu.. I'm using N7600GT/2DHT graphics card and there is a tool in gnome with which I enabled the Nvidia acceleration driver ...but where can i now configure my card ... e.g. TV dual monitor settings ...etc
with kmod-nvidia I had an entry in the Menu saying Nvidia Settings
does anyone have the N7600GT too and is willing to guide me ?
